definition: horn (automobile etc)/loudspeaker/brass wind instrument/trumpet/suona 鎖吶|锁呐[suo3 na4]
denote a sound or sharp noise (gunfire etc)
(lit.) blowing the trumpet/(fig.) to praise sb/(slang) to give a blowjob

sentences.english: Firecrackers exploded, flags flew high, and cars honked wildly.
sentences.chinese: 炮聲陣陣，旗幟飛揚，就連汽車的喇叭都摁得朝天響。

sentences.english: Cy jordan silenced the warning horn .
sentences.chinese: 賽伊喬丹關掉了報警喇叭。

sentences.english: Press the horn appeared in a hoarse voice of sand.
sentences.chinese: 按下喇叭出現沙啞聲音沙。

sentences.english: I don't know why the driver keeps riding on the  horn.
sentences.chinese: 我不曉得他爲什麼一直按喇叭。

sentences.english: Backwards look like a small horn, like a string of beautiful necklace.
sentences.chinese: 倒着看像一個小喇叭，又像一串串美麗的項鍊。

sentences.english: Lao Wan hoists the bottle thrusting it into his mouth as if he were blowing a bugle.
sentences.chinese: 老萬舉起酒瓶，對着嘴喝將起來，好像吹喇叭一樣。

sentences.english: Hydrogen is easily ignited by heat, open flames, electrical sparks, and static electricity.
sentences.chinese: 電系統爲點火，喇叭，燈光，發熱器和起動器提供電。

sentences.english: Jeans with flared legs are popular this year.
sentences.chinese: 牛仔褲是喇叭口的款式，今年很流行。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, steer clear of tapered leg openings or a wide bell-bottomed look.
sentences.chinese: 同時，不要穿錐形或寬腿喇叭型的牛仔褲。

sentences.english: The driver tooted his horn as he approached the bend.
sentences.chinese: 開車的人在快要轉彎時按響了喇叭。

sentences.english: The car horn is like a lovely word defiled. It was never meant to be profane.
sentences.chinese: 汽車的喇叭聲是個被誤解的可愛字眼。

sentences.english: The father honks the horn just as the boy crosses in front of their car.
sentences.chinese: 小男孩從汽車前經過時他按響了喇叭。

sentences.english: I asked over the blare of horns.
sentences.chinese: 在汽車喇叭的轟鳴聲中我問他。

sentences.english: In China, however, tooting the horn seems to have two other meanings.
sentences.chinese: 但在中國，鳴喇叭似乎有兩種別的意思。

sentences.english: Some say it is a modern variant of the kudu horn used traditionally in southern African culture.
sentences.chinese: 有人說它是南非傳統的紕角鹿喇叭的現代變體。

definition: sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
to receive a radio signal/to make an audio recording/(of an auditorium etc) to have good acoustics/(vocal training, linguistics) ending (of a word or syllable)
